messages.subject: t.v. shows

messages.messageBody:
My all time favorite show to watch with my son is "spoungebob" I
love that show - it's a riot !!!! That is one of my favorite things
to do because snuggling is great with hot cocoa or popcorn :)

I use to be one of those moms that didn't like certain shows and one
of those shows was Rug rats because they didn't speak correctly. I
would let my son watch it but I would tell him the part that bugged
me. I don't worry about my son talking like them anymore so I kid
around about the show and talk like them and it drives my son crazy
LOL.................................................

I think the dialogue with them is real important. If I am doing
other things my son always runs where I am to tell me the funny part
of what is happening. I get such a kick out of it :)

Sonya
Attleboro,Mass
